body.description: A refreshing, cleansing experience for your intimate area so you can take on anything. Summer's Eve Refreshing feminine care products comes in a variety of indulgent SafeScents letting you experience that unique, everyday Summer’s Eve readiness. Summer's Eve Feminine Body Wash is created for your most intimate areas to gently cleanse away the bacteria that can cause odor. Uniquely formulated and pH-balanced to match your body's natural chemistry. All Summer's Eve feminine hygiene products, along with every unique scent, are gynecologist tested to ensure they are safe, even for sensitive skin. Morning Paradise indulgent Safe Scent is inspired by sun-kissed fruits and sweet-scented flowers and gentle enough for your most delicate skin. That’s why millions of women trust our expansive range of gynecologist-tested cleansing and care. Our wide variety of products are made for everybody – whether you’re at home or on the go, want to bask in fragrant lusciousness or no scent at all or want ultra-Refreshing or high performance. With every Summer’s Eve product you use, know that We See You, We Get You, We Got You. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 SafeScents 2 Odor-Causing Bacteria 3 Gynecologist Tested 4 pH-Balanced 5 Free From Dyes & Parabens

Summer's Eve Refresh Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Free from Parabens Tested SafeScents Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Free from Parabens Tested SafeScents

What do you mean by "Safe Scents"? We want to provide you with safe, best smelling products for your intimate care routine. All of our scented cosmetic products are clinically tested by gynecologists to ensure that they are safe, even for those of us with sensitive skin. What's the Refresh Collection? Our Refresh Collection is for those who love to bask in luscious fragrances. It has has an extensive range of fragrance levels, from a light, barely-there fragrance or a bold fragrance that gives you a long-lasting boost of freshness Why does pH matter? It's important to your body’s natural defense and maintaining a good environment for a healthy external vaginal area. The pH of ordinary soap, can be very basic (high pH) and may not complement the natural pH range of your external vaginal area. Isn’t Summer’s Eve and Fem Care just if you have a problem? I don’t have an issue “down there” … The external vaginal area is different than other parts of your body – its delicate, and has a different pH than other areas of the body – and so it needs a different kind of care. What can I do if I experience vaginal itching? If you are experiencing vaginal itching, we recommend you talk with your doctor or healthcare professional about your symptoms. If you know that you have a yeast infection, you can find relief with one of our Monistat products.

reviews.reviewText: I love this feminine hygiene product. Its really good and makes me feel so fresh. Gentle enough to use often and it smells Great too. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic at controlling odor and leaving you feeling clean and fresh...
reviews.reviewText: As I have gotten older, my body has gone through some major changes. Using soap and water just doesn’t do the job anymore. I need a product that will balance my PH levels and help with any odor this may cause.This Summer’s Eve Cleansing Wash is very lightly scented and makes you feel clean and fresh after using it. What I like about it is you are not left smelling like a perfume factory. It leaves you feeling thoroughly “cleansed” with just a slight hint of peaches. This scent does dissipate quickly when you come out of the shower and dry off. The other wonderful thing about this product is it comes in several different scents depending on your preference.With these products, I have never experienced any irritation or sensitivity. You can choose to apply this with your hands, a washcloth, or a bath sponge. I have been using Summer’s Eve cleansing wash for many years and have not deviated from using this product. I have also come to discover that Amazon has the best prices for a 3-pack of the cleansing wash.I highly recommend this wash as it is PH balanced, does a fantastic job of controlling odor, and leaves you feeling clean and fresh.I did purchase this with my own money and these are my thoughts and opinions solely.PROS*Cleanses away odor causing bacteria*No skin irritation*Comes in a variety of scents*Gentle to use everyday*Great price for a 3-packCONS*none

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This item I uses very much,I decided to try this one a different fragrance than my go to.The fragrance is not a good one. The wash within itself is always a good buy But honestly I will not purchase this one anymore. Great product just not a good fragrance.

reviews.reviewText: This product is great, but the item arrived with the product is the bag. So, I know I’m not getting the full bottle, because some of it leaked out into the packaging. I just washed it off, and called it a day.
Ottimo prodotto, lo compraro altre sicuramente
Good product but the scent is not great. Cheapest option available in my location, but other scents are a lot better.Also initially received a damaged item but was able to easily exchange it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 19, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: Great gentle product with appealing scent
reviews.reviewText: As title! Totally non-irritating way to freshen up (externally!) and the scent is lovely - as someone below says, blends very well with your natural scent and the soft fruitiness is much more pleasant and appropriate somehow than a floral.

Un produit assez difficile à trouver, encore plus à un prix raisonnable en France.Disponible sur Amazon et livré à domicile, un gel nettoyant avec un parfum agréable, efficace, que l'on ne pensait pas trouver en dehors des USA.
